name: Moe! Ninja Girls
description: You transfer to a school and start a new school life...all the while hiding you're a genius ninja.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows10(64Bit) Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-4340 CPU @ 3.60GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 110 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
